name: The Knight of Glory and Justice
name_original: The Knight of Glory and Justice
description:
How to play:
Traverse the world with WASD, running through the tall grass areas to enter a battle. Use your mouse to navigate the UI and fight the opponent.

Notes:
Fire will cause opponents to burn on their turn
Water will cause opponents to be wet, amplifying lightning damage
Either of those spells will remove the effect of the other!
